content.rendered:
Packages

Experience The Best

Our Packages

1 Day

    Pre Sales Request

    Fill free to contact us for any additional informations

    1 Day Mysore Tour

    Mysore

    Embark on a captivating journey through Mysore's rich history and cultural heritage with our one-day tour. Explore iconic landmarks, immerse yourself in vibrant markets, and savour the flavours of local cuisine on this unforgettable adventure.

    Terms & Conditions Apply*

    Details
    From

    5500 ₹

    2 Days

      Pre Sales Request

      Fill free to contact us for any additional informations

      2 Days Bangalore to Chikmagalur Tour

      Chikmagalur

      Escape to the serene landscapes of Chikmagalur on our two-day tour from Bangalore. Immerse yourself in nature's beauty, indulge in adventure activities, and unwind in comfortable accommodations amidst lush surroundings for a truly rejuvenating getaway.

      Terms & Conditions Apply*

      Details
      From

      16500 ₹

      2 Days

        Pre Sales Request

        Fill free to contact us for any additional informations

        2 Days Bangalore to Coorg Tour

        Coorg

        Embark on a scenic journey from Bangalore to Coorg for a two-day adventure filled with natural wonders and cultural delights. Explore verdant coffee plantations, visit cascading waterfalls, and experience the charm of Coorg's hill station lifestyle while enjoying comfortable accommodations for a memorable retreat.

        Terms & Conditions Apply*

        Details
        From

        16500 ₹

        2 Days

          Pre Sales Request

          Fill free to contact us for any additional informations

          2 Days Bangalore to Ooty Tour

          Ooty

          ​​Join us on a two-day journey from Bangalore to Ooty, where you'll discover the beauty of the Nilgiris. Experience the tranquillity of lush tea estates, marvel at breathtaking viewpoints, and immerse yourself in the charm of Ooty's colonial heritage. With comfortable accommodations included, this tour promises a refreshing escape into the lap of nature.

          Terms & Conditions Apply*

          Details
          From

          17000 ₹

          3 Days

            Pre Sales Request

            Fill free to contact us for any additional informations

            3 days Bangalore to Mysore and Coorg Tour

            Mysore and Coorg

            Experience the best of Karnataka's cultural and natural treasures on our three-day tour from Bangalore to Mysore and Coorg. Explore the royal heritage of Mysore, including its magnificent palaces and vibrant markets, before immersing yourself in the serene landscapes of Coorg. From lush coffee plantations to cascading waterfalls, this tour offers a perfect blend of history, culture, and nature. With comfortable accommodations included, get ready for an unforgettable journey through the heart of South India.

            Terms & Conditions Apply*

            Details
            From

            21000 ₹

            3 Days

              Pre Sales Request

              Fill free to contact us for any additional informations

              3 days Bangalore to Mysore and Ooty Tour

              Mysore and Ooty

              Embark on a captivating three-day journey from Bangalore to Mysore and Ooty, immersing yourself in the rich history and scenic beauty of Southern India. Explore the majestic palaces and vibrant markets of Mysore, then venture into the picturesque landscapes of Ooty, where lush tea gardens and cascading waterfalls await. With comfortable accommodations included, this tour offers an unforgettable experience of culture, nature, and relaxation.

              Terms & Conditions Apply*

              Details
              From

              21000 ₹

              3 Days

                Pre Sales Request

                Fill free to contact us for any additional informations

                3 Days Bangalore to Chikmagalur Tour

                Chikmagalur

                Experience the serene beauty of Chikmagalur on our three-day trip with Lishika Holidays, complete with comfortable accommodations nestled amidst nature's embrace. Explore the verdant coffee plantations, rejuvenate by cascading waterfalls, and embark on thrilling treks guided by experts. With cosy accommodations included, immerse yourself in the tranquillity and natural splendour of Chikmagalur with Lishika Holidays.

                Terms & Conditions Apply*

                Details
                From

                21000 ₹

                3 Days

                  Pre Sales Request

                  Fill free to contact us for any additional informations

                  3 Days Bangalore to Coorg Tour

                  Coorg

                  Embark on a captivating three-day journey from Bangalore to Coorg with Lishika Holidays. Immerse yourself in the lush greenery of Coorg's coffee plantations, visit cascading waterfalls, and explore the rich cultural heritage of this enchanting hill station. With comfortable accommodations and expert guidance, get ready for an unforgettable experience in the serene landscapes of Coorg with Lishika Holidays.

                  Terms & Conditions Apply*

                  Details
                  From

                  21000 ₹

                  4 Days

                    Pre Sales Request

                    Fill free to contact us for any additional informations

                    4 Days Bangalore to Mysore and Coorg Tour

                    Mysore and Coorg

                    Embark on an enriching four-day journey from Bangalore to Mysore and Coorg with Lishika Holidays. Discover the regal heritage of Mysore as you explore majestic palaces and vibrant markets. Then, venture into the verdant landscapes of Coorg, where lush coffee plantations and cascading waterfalls await. With comfortable accommodations and expert guidance throughout, prepare for an unforgettable experience blending culture, nature, and relaxation with Lishika Holidays.

                    Terms & Conditions Apply*

                    Details
                    From

                    28000 ₹

                    4 Days

                      Pre Sales Request

                      Fill free to contact us for any additional informations

                      4 Days Bangalore to Mysore and Ooty Tour

                      Mysore and Ooty

                      Indulge in a delightful four-day excursion from Bangalore to Mysore and Ooty with Lishika Holidays. Explore the regal charm of Mysore as you visit majestic palaces and vibrant markets. Then, journey to the picturesque hill station of Ooty, where you'll be enchanted by lush tea gardens and serene lakes. With comfortable accommodations and expert guidance throughout, prepare for an unforgettable journey through the cultural and natural wonders of South India with Lishika Holidays.

                      Terms & Conditions Apply*

                      Details
                      From

                      29000 ₹

                      7 Days

                        Pre Sales Request

                        Fill free to contact us for any additional informations

                        7 Days Bangalore to Mysore, Coorg, Ooty and Kodaikanal Tour

                        Mysore, Coorg, Ooty and Kodaikanal

                        Embark on an unforgettable seven-day odyssey from Bangalore to Mysore, Ooty, Coorg, and Kodaikanal with Lishika Holidays. Experience the regal splendour of Mysore, the serene beauty of Ooty's hill stations, the lush greenery of Coorg's coffee plantations, and the tranquil charm of Kodaikanal. With comfortable accommodations and expert guidance throughout, this journey promises an immersive exploration of South India's diverse landscapes and cultural heritage with Lishika Holidays.

                        Terms & Conditions Apply*

                        Details
                        From

                        49000 ₹

                        6 Days

                          Pre Sales Request

                          Fill free to contact us for any additional informations

                          6 Days Bangalore to Mysore, Coorg and Ooty Tour

                          Mysore, Coorg and Ooty

                          Embark on a mesmerising six-day adventure from Bangalore to Mysore, Coorg, and Ooty with Lishika Holidays. Discover the royal heritage of Mysore, explore the verdant landscapes of Coorg's coffee plantations, and immerse yourself in the serene beauty of Ooty's hill stations. With comfortable accommodations and expert guidance, this journey promises an unforgettable experience of culture, nature, and relaxation with Lishika Holidays.

                          Terms & Conditions Apply*

                          Details
                          From

                          41000 ₹

                          5 Days

                            Pre Sales Request

                            Fill free to contact us for any additional informations

                            5 Days Bangalore to Mysore, Coorg and Ooty Tour

                            Mysore, Coorg and Ooty

                            Embark on a captivating five-day journey from Bangalore to Mysore, Coorg, and Ooty with Lishika Holidays. Discover the regal charm of Mysore, explore the lush coffee plantations of Coorg, and immerse yourself in the scenic beauty of Ooty's hill stations. With comfortable accommodations and expert guidance throughout, this journey promises an unforgettable experience of culture, nature, and relaxation with Lishika Holidays.

                            Terms & Conditions Apply*

                            Details
                            From

                            33000 ₹

                            3 Days

                              Pre Sales Request

                              Fill free to contact us for any additional informations

                              3 Days Bangalore to Ooty Tour

                              Mysore, Coorg and Ooty

                              Embark on a delightful three-day escapade from Bangalore to Ooty with Lishika Holidays. Immerse yourself in the tranquil beauty of Ooty's hill stations, explore scenic viewpoints, and indulge in the charm of this picturesque destination. With comfortable accommodations and expert guidance throughout, this short yet enchanting journey promises an unforgettable experience with Lishika Holidays.

                              Terms & Conditions Apply*

                              Details
                              From

                              22000 ₹
